bot.title: Scale with BOT model
bot.subtitle: Build, Operate, Transfer - BOT Model: We help you get your India captive unit with ease
bot.feature.title.0: Are you getting the right talent?
bot.feature.desc.0: I am very busy with Funding, Product Market Fitment, Engineering, Sales and Expansion. Getting right talent, focus and scale is often second priority for me because of time constraints.
bot.feature.title.1: Do you currently have capacity constraint?
bot.feature.desc.1: There are often many pending feature backlogs that if they had been completed would have helped the company grow further.
bot.feature.title.2: Is your spending optimized, and I am ready to scale up?
bot.feature.desc.2: I have not given enough attention for optimised and lowering costs.
bot.feature.title.3: I am concerned of losing control and compromised security if I engage outside?
bot.feature.desc.3: There is always a question on IP leakage, security, compliances and I may lose control.
bot.contact.desc: If you are a Founder/Executive and the answer to any of the above questions is yes, then go ahead and feel free to contact us at
bot.services.title: Partners With Skin In The Game With Unique Operating Model
bot.services.desc: Help you set up your captive in India without undergoing the expanding pains and bothering of setting business in India
bot.services.title.0.desc.0: We take care of all paper work, statutory checks and balances and transparently share with you every details
bot.services.title.1.desc.1: Operate in Steady and stealth mode
bot.services.title.2.desc.0: Scale up infra, talent and projects
bot.how.title: HOW WE DO IT? WHAT YOU GET? HOW CAN WE HELP YOU?
bot.how.desc: Scale in India, scale with us. We will build your captive organization and operate it till you want to manage it
bot.how.content.title.0.title.0: Formation of Biz Entity in India
bot.how.list.0: India has amazing large talent pool and we can help you secure and operate that
bot.how.list.1: Set up the operations and run in all aspect till you wish to take control 100%
bot.how.list.2: India statutory and laws are not employer friendly and requires high touchpoints. We manage all that complexity for you.
bot.how.list.3: Help scale fast with numbers and throughput with experienced execution team.
bot.how.list.4: Not just an outsourcing partner , we are coming as engineering back office for company
bot.how.list.5: We will have our skin in the game for Your success, and we benefit for showing positive outcomes for company
bot.need.title: What We Need?
bot.need.desc: You get a Turn Key operation in as fast as 2 yearsâ€¦
bot.need.items.desc.0: We need to know what engineers will work on, how many and when
bot.need.items.desc.1: In year 1, last 1 or 2 rounds to be done by company staff and hire only when agreed (year 2 fully from India)
bot.need.items.desc.2: Some people will be needed to travel India (reverse osmosis), Some people from India travel to HQ (osmosis)
bot.need.items.desc.3: Forward looking 2 Qtr. Plan & than retrospect monthly session on what went right/wrong and fine tune plan ahead
bot.need.items.title.4: Agreed Engineering Operating Model as driven by company
bot.need.items.desc.4: You decide Reporting structure, Hierarchy, Issue escalation and resolutions and we provide options
bot.need.items.desc.5: 4 months Advanced Payments made for projections made. Any adjustments are discussed in monthly operations meetings..
